title: By the Generall Assembly of the Confederate Catholicks of Ireland it is ordered, that any commander or officer whatsoever, that shall ... refuse or decline the service for the present supply of His Majestie ...
author: Confederate Catholics.
notes: Other title information from first lines of text.
Contains also a statement signed at end: Glamorgan.
"Kilkenny 9. March 1645. By command of the Concell, R. Bellings."
Reproduction of original in Bodleian Library.
